article_text:
A brand new memorial is in the works to honor the men and woman who took part in the American Revolution. But organizers need some help.

The purpose of the Wichita memorial is to erect and educational monument to memorialize the heroes to gave us a free nation.

Tiles are being sold that will line the wall: tiles that will be etched with the names of those who took part in the Revolutionary War.
